ing: 3 cloves garlic, or more to taste, minced
1 1/2 teaspoons red pepper flakes, or to taste
des: "Bring on the BBQ! This flavorful marinade will deliver a melt-in-your-mouth grilled steak. Makes enough for 3 medium-sized steaks. Marinate for at least 1 hour. Try dried cilantro in place of the coriander if you prefer."
ins: Whisk olive oil, soy sauce, coriander, Worcestershire sauce, garlic, and red pepper flakes together in a bowl.
